pageProduct.name: QV Face Gentle Cleanser 500G
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Ego QV Face Gentle Cleanser has been specifically formulated to gently cleanse dry or sensitive skin. The creamy formulation protects against the drying effect of cleansing and leaves skin feeling fresh, soft and moisturised.

* Soap free;
* Suitable for dry or sensitive skin;
* Gently formulated for the face;
* pH 6;
* Colour free;
* Dermatologically tested;
* Manufactured to pharmaceutical standards.

Warnings

Caution: For external use only. If lather enters eyes, flush well with water.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium Laurth Sulfate, Safflower Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius), Soft White Paraffin (Petrolatum), Lauryl Betaine, Glycerol (Glycerin), Xanthan Gum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hydroxybenzoates (Methyl and Popyl Paraben), BHT, Citric acid.

Directions

Use morning and night. Moisten face with water. Lather a small amount of cleanser on hands then gently massage onto face and neck. Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Follow with QV Face Moisturising Cream.
